name: An Encounter [Original Ver.]
description:
"This must be how ghosts feel...."

Van was a girl that had nearly given up on life, wishing for the rain to take her. That is, until she met a kind girl offering her umbrella, as well as her friendship.

Features:

  • The original, unfinished version of An Encounter ~ In The Rain ~
  • 7,000+ words in length
  • Linear -- there's choices but only one ending
  • Because this version is incomplete, the ending is super abrupt

Want to play the finalized 2019 version? Get it below---
